articles.author: Teele Rebane, Hannah Ritchie and Maija Ehlinger, CNN
articles.title: Deadly earthquakes hit southern Iran
articles.description: At least five people were killed and 44 others injured following a string of earthquakes in southern Iran on Saturday, according to the country's semi-official FARS news agency.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue
articles.title: Supreme Court makes it clear there's a red America and a blue America
articles.description: The US Supreme Court ended its most explosive term in decades this week deeply split along ideological lines, surfacing two different visions of America and the Constitution.
articles.content:

articles.title: Suspect charged in fatal shooting of New York City mother who was pushing a baby stroller
articles.description: Authorities arrested and charged the man who they say shot and killed a mother who was pushing a 3-month-old baby in a stroller in Manhattan's Upper East Side on Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Fareed's take: A radical court - CNN Video
articles.description: Following a week of divisive rulings by the US Supreme Court on abortion and guns, Fareed gives his take on the historically impartial institution that he says is becoming increasingly political.

articles.author: Lauren del Valle and Samantha Beech, CNN
articles.title: New York lawmakers move to enshrine abortion rights in state constitution
articles.description: The New York State Legislature on Friday passed a constitutional amendment that, if fully enacted, would enshrine the right to an abortion and contraception access in the state constitution.
